---
title: "Build LGII + Environmental Dataset"
output: html_document
params:
  lgii: "data/nasa/spatialecon-lgii-measures-v1-xlsx.xlsx"
  kaggle_dir: "data/kaggle"
  out: "data/processed/merged.csv"
---

This R Markdown document executes the Python pipeline that merges the NASA
LGII workbook with the Kaggle environmental rasters and writes the enriched
CSV defined in `params`.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = TRUE, message = TRUE)
normalize_or_passthrough <- function(path) {
  tryCatch(
    normalizePath(path, winslash = "/", mustWork = FALSE),
    error = function(e) path
  )
}
Sys.setenv(
  BUILD_LGII = normalize_or_passthrough(params$lgii),
  BUILD_KAGGLE = normalize_or_passthrough(params$kaggle_dir),
  BUILD_OUT = normalize_or_passthrough(params$out)
)
